ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Detailed description of the type of planned activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

ivardefs.name: dailyAmount
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed in a given day.

ivardefs.name: definition
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the planned activity should be conducted in accordance with.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities.  It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions.  Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such a

ivardefs.name: goal_
ivardefs.desc: Internal reference that identifies the goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

ivardefs.name: performer_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity.

ivardefs.name: prohibited
ivardefs.desc: If true, indicates that the described activity is one that must NOT be engaged in when following the plan.  If false, indicates that the described activity is one that should be engaged in when following the plan.

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be supplied, administered or consumed by the subject.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Provides the health condition(s) that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Identifies what progress is being made for the specific activity.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Provides reason why the activity isn't yet started, is on hold, was cancelled, etc.

properties.desc: A simple summary of a planned activity suitable for a general care plan system (e.g. form driven) that doesn't know about specific resources such as procedure etc.
